Spears::

The tiny chip expoded.  It left a small burn moark on her neck and 
nothng more. Her self destruct program wasn't activated.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm slides the machine away, looking at Spears' spark inside 
it. 
> At least if she self destructed now, her spark would be allright. 
He 
> watches the machine as it lightly bumps against the other side of 
the 
> room, the Maximal turning back to Spears.
> 
> "Allright, now let's see what we can do about that chip," he says 
to 
> himself, taking a small device from the table. It was tiny in his 
> large fingers, but he managed to aim it at the trainer chip, a 
small 
> beam emerging out of it. It was a mini EMP generator, designed to 
> disable tiny electric devices.
